segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is, just standing in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but at least they’re having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor if it keeps overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet and end this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s dress is getting wet, and she still doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR
